hero.title: Biomira Medical
hero.subtitle: Your Strategic Solution Partner in Medical Devices

about.title: Pioneering Solutions in
about.subtitle: Medical Marketing
about.description1: As one of the pioneering marketing firms, we aim to provide innovative and sustainable solutions. Our company, aware of its unique sensitivities and legal requirements, offers end-to-end solutions in the field of medical marketing. With our service approach based on scientific accuracy, ethical approach and strategic perspective, we increase the visibility and effectiveness of pharmaceutical, medical device and healthcare brands in the market.
about.description2: With our expert team, we aim to provide effective communication to the right target audiences by integrating digital and traditional marketing channels. We focus on producing solutions that strengthen the value of brands, build trust and support sustainable success.
about.valuesDescription: As BiomiraMed, our core values guide us in every step

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: With our expert and experienced team, we provide professional solutions in every project.

trustQuality.title: Trust and Quality
trustQuality.description: We are pioneers in the industry with our quality products and reliable service approach.

addedValue.title: Added Value
addedValue.description: We develop solutions that continuously provide added value to our customers.

continuousInnovation.title: Continuous Innovation
continuousInnovation.description: We offer innovative solutions in the sector through continuous research and development.

products.title: Innovative Products

viscoPhi.title: ViscoPhi™
viscoPhi.description: ViscoPhi™ is a sterile ready-to-use intra-articular viscoelastic implant gel solution to treat human joint disorders such as osteoarthritis and it comes in a prefilled, ready to use syringe.
viscoPhi.feature1: Linear bond, Crosslinked and Combined Hyaluronic Acid

visOcu.title: VisOcu™
visOcu.description: VisOcu™ is a sterile, cohesive, isotonic, pyrogen-free, and viscoelastic preparation of highly purified HA and HPMC.
visOcu.feature2: Lubrication, support and protection of ocular tissues

philExir.title: PhilExir™
philExir.description: PhilExir™ is a cutting-edge injectable designed to revitalize facial contours and awaken skin radiance, helping you look refreshed, lifted, and beautifully renewed.
philExir.feature4: Challenge fatigue and aging with PhilExir

products.ctaTitle: Contact us to take your brand one step further
products.ctaDescription: Our expert team is ready to develop custom healthcare technology solutions for you. Contact us immediately and let's bring your projects to life.

detail.contactDescription: Contact us to get more information about our product catalogs

intraocular.title: Intraocular Viscoelastics
intraocular.description: Premium ophthalmic viscoelastic solutions designed for optimal surgical control and eye protection.

intraArticular.title: Intra-articular Viscoelastics
intraArticular.description: Advanced joint injection solutions designed to increase mobility and reduce discomfort.

dermalFillers.title: Dermal Filler & Cosmetics
dermalFillers.description: Luxury aesthetic products focused on natural-looking improvement, safety, and long life.
